## perpendicularCCW variable

Inline function. Returns counter-clockwise perpendicular vector (assuming Y-up). \[-y, x\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
perpendicularCCW: (v: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"vec2">) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Lit<"vec2">
```
